articles.author: ANI
articles.title: India becomes Europe's largest supplier of refined fuels after Russian oil ban - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Europe's reliance on Indian crude oil products has grown since the ban on Russian oil. Its refined fuel imports likely to surge above 360,000 barrels a day.
articles.content:
India has become Europe's largest supplier of refined fuels this month while simultaneously buying record amounts of Russian crude, according to data from analytics firm Kpler.
